General.Name: Amosense Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Amosense Co.,Ltd. manufactures electronic components, modules, devises, and solutions for IT, IOT, Bio, environment, automotive, and energy industries. IT offers antennas, shielding materials, chip varistors, and amorphous core products, as well as safety and security buttons, asset trackers, and condition monitoring sensors. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
